name: Drome Racers
description:
Drome Racers is a racing-arcade game developed by small, Möbius Entertainment and Attention to Detail. It came out on 20-11-2002. small published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Drome Racers is available on Game Boy Advance, GameCube, PC and PlayStation 2.
It was produced by David Rutter, Dean Roskell and Lara Sweeney. Gavin Cheshire directed the game. John Hancock, Mark Hyett, Stafford Bawler and Steven Gow scored the game.
